Package org.xflatdb.xflat.db

This package contains the core classes for XFlat.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Engine
    The base interface for an XFlat table engine.
    EngineAction<T>
    Represents an action that a table can perform with an engine.
    EngineActionEx<T,TEx extends XFlatDataException>
    Represents an action that a table can perform with an engine.
    EngineBase.SpinDownEventHandler
    An event handler for the events fired when an Engine finishes spinning down.
    EngineFactory
    An EngineFactory chooses which Engine to instantiate based on the given File.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BigIntIdGenerator
    An IdGenerator which generates incrementing integer IDs.
    ConvertingKeyValueTable
    A KeyValueTable implementation using the XFlat conversion service to convert values to XML.
    ConvertingTable<T>
    A table implementation that converts objects to elements using the database's conversion service.
    ElementTable
    This is the simple Table implementation for tables of JDOM Elements.
    EngineBase
    The base class for Engine objects.
    EngineBase.SpinDownEvent
    An event object given to the EngineBase.SpinDownEventHandler when an engine finishes spinning down.
    EngineTransactionManager
    The Base Class of all Transaction Managers.

    This class defines the contract required of Transaction Manager implementations by XFlat.
    IdAccessor<T>
    A helper class that accesses the IDs of an object.
    IdGenerator
    The base class for an ID generator.
    ShardedEngineBase<T>
    The base class for all engines that are sharded.
    TableBase
    The base class for implementations of Table.
    TableMetadata
    A class containing metadata about a Table, and providing the ability to spin up engines for that table.
    TableMetadataFactory
    A Factory which creates TableMetadata instances.
    TimestampIdGenerator
    An ID Generator that generates timestamp based IDs.
    UuidIdGenerator
    Implements an ID generator which generates IDs using java's UUID class
    XFlatDatabase
    This database implementation manages a local directory of tables.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    EngineState
    Represents the progression of states in an engine as it is used.
    XFlatDatabase.DatabaseState
    Represents the various states of the Database.

Package org.xflatdb.xflat.db Description

This package contains the core classes for XFlat.

The XFlatDatabase, which is the primary implementation of the Database interface, is the entry point for applications requiring XFlat. A new instance should be constructed and initialized, after which the public interfaces can be used.
